fields.name: Fullstack Javascript Developer
fields.description: Work with a cutting edge Californian company, building the IoT (Internet of Things) of tommorrow.
fields.description_es: Trabaja en una compañia Californiana con tecnologia de punta, contruyendo el IoT (Internet of Things) del mañana.
fields.title: Fullstack Javascript Developer

fields.name: Systems Administrator
fields.description: Work in a leading firm in the financial sector. Learn how things are done at the biggest stock market in the world: the NYSE, there is a big opportunity and challenge waiting for you.
fields.description_es: Trabaja en una empresa líder en el sector financiero. Aprende cómo se hacen las cosas en el mercado de valores más grande del mundo: la Bolsa de Nueva York, hay una gran oportunidad y desafío esperándote.
fields.title: Systems Administrator (junior, mid, and senior)
fields.title_es: Administrador de Sistemas (junior, mid y senior)

fields.name: Default Campaign
fields.description: We have open positions in a diverse group of companies from each sector. By completing this form, you will have unlimited access to new positions every day. This is a 100% free service.
fields.description_es: Tenemos vacantes abiertas en diversas empresas de todos los sectores. Solo llenando este formulario, tendrás acceso ilimitado a nuevas vacantes todo los dias. Este es un servicio 100% gratuito.
fields.title: Send us your CV

fields.name: Senior Back-End Engineer
fields.description: Work for a exciting startup that is revolutionizing the payment industry. Prevent frauds which allows our merchants to process payments on a smooth and secure way.
fields.description_es: Trabaja para un startup que está revolucionando la industria de pagos. Previene fraudes y permite que nuestros usuarios procesecen sus pagos de forma fácil y confiable.
fields.title: Senior Back-End Engineer
